content: stay warm this winter with this easy crochet infinity scarf pattern featuring diagonal ribbing the aspen crochet infinity scarf is worked in row and later seamed to become an infinity scarf if you d like to forgo the seaming and have a regular scarf instead you can absolutely do that because this infinity crochet scarf pattern has a simple classic texture this scarf is a fantastic gift for any gender and any age requiring only the knowledge of how to chain half_double_crochet work in the back loop only and work in row this crochet pattern is fairly easy and accessible to beginners you ll learn how to decrease half_double_crochet 2 together and how to increase place 2 stitches in 1 stitch with this pattern if you want an easy crochet infinity scarf pattern that still packs a punch of personality you ll love the aspen infinity scarf with it s clever diagonal ribbing ★skill level easy/medium to advanced beginner- to use this crochet scarf pattern you should know how to *read a crochet pattern - there is no video tutorial for this pattern but there is a detailed step by step photo tutorial *chain half_double_crochet and work in row *prior knowledge of working in the back loop only blo and decreasing hdc2tog will be helpful but this crochet infinity scarf s photo tutorial will teach you these techniques ★pattern includes 1 full version pdf with photo tutorial for seaming row 1 through 3 which are repeated through the pattern working in the back loop only and decreasing 2 printer friendly pdf with only one picture to save ink ★terms used us standard pattern is written in english ★size approximately 60 inches long before seaming approximately 6 inches wide it is very easy to customize both the width and length of this crochet infinity scarf ★materials required medium 4 weight yarn of your choice you will need approximately 4 25 ounces / 120 grams / 268 yards yarn used loops and threads impeccable in colorway camo tweed i used just about 1 and ½ skeins ★tools 5 mm h-8 hook tapestry needle scissors stitch markers make sure to tag me in your instagram photos so i can show you some love tag @theloopholefoxcrochet or use #theloopholefoxcrochet to show me your finished work i hope you love your aspen infinity scarf as much as i love mine enjoy
